Name: Experience Sharing
Text: Kowloong sends a delegation to visit you and learn your advanced business and management philosophy.

Name: Experience Sharing
Text: The delegation speaks highly of your vision and thanks you for sharing the development experience.

Name: Experience Sharing
Text: You obtain their understanding. They thank you for your hospitality and tell you they'll come back if given another opportunity.

Name: Seasoned Veteran
Text: The sales team hopes to leverage our island brand to empower the sales department, focusing on key promotional strategies to launch a comprehensive campaign. They aim to align efforts among departments and develop new tactics to achieve a decisive advantage over competitors.

Name: Seasoned Veteran
Text: Knowledge is power. With the new strategy, you manage to achieve a decisive advantage over competitors.

Name: Seasoned Veteran
Text: Although you didn't fully understand their strategy and couldn't achieve an overwhelming victory, you still managed to make some progress.

Name: Proposal of Cooperation
Text: A city has initiated a proposal of cooperation that suggests you to lead other cities to make the market prosperous together.

Name: Proposal of Cooperation
Text: All parties responded positively. The market thrived.

Name: Proposal of Cooperation
Text: Your partner has proposed a plan and taken the lead, and you have also gained some benefits.

Name: Stabilizing the Market
Text: A city has initiated a proposal of cooperation that suggests everyone to work together to stabilize the market.

Name: Stabilizing the Market
Text: Your joint effort has offset the instability of the market.

Name: Stabilizing the Market
Text: The collaboration has achieved some results, but it still falls short of expectations.

Name: Mission Fulfilled
Text: Many cities have sent representatives to check if the City Missions have been properly executed.

Name: Mission Fulfilled
Text: The representatives are very satisfied. We have gained more support.

Name: Mission Fulfilled
Text: Your partner understands your difficulties and has still provided some support.

Name: Mission Confirmation
Text: You initiate a new proposal of cooperation that requires each city to confirm your progress on existing commissions before deciding whether to help.

Name: Mission Confirmation
Text: Grateful for your completion of the missions. all the cities agree with you on further collaborations and are willing to offer more help in the future.

Name: Mission Confirmation
Text: Your partner says they can understand the situation you are in, but will have to reduce their support.

Name: Building Blueprint I
Text: Someone approaches you. Calling himself the Legend of Akdilek, he claims to have an extraordinary building blueprint for sale. Affordable, and beloved by all! Own it, and life will be worry-free! Miss this chance, and it's gone forever!

Name: Building Blueprint I
Text: He keeps searching his case. And just before your patience runs out, he finally finds something and throws it to you.

Name: Building Blueprint I
Text: Seeing that you're not interested, he vanishes into thin air before leaving behind an ordinary building blueprint. You can't help but wonder if it was a hallucination.

Name: Building Blueprint II
Text: Someone approaches you. Calling herself the Hidden Master of the Bay, she claims to have an extraordinary building blueprint, but you must pass a test before you can have it.

Name: Building Blueprint II
Text: You have completed the challenge. She seems even more pleased than you are and gladly hands over the blueprint.

Name: Building Blueprint II
Text: Seeing that you're not interested, she vanishes into thin air before leaving behind an ordinary building blueprint. You can't help but wonder if it was a hallucination.

Name: Building Blueprint III
Text: Someone approaches you. Calling herself the Wandering Cardman Rider, she claims to have an extraordinary building blueprint, but you must show your good faith before you can have it.

Name: Building Blueprint III
Text: Tentatively, you offer her some goods, which she gladly accepts as if they were treasures. She eagerly shows you the building blueprint.

Name: Building Blueprint III
Text: You show no interest in her offer. You feel as if someone hit you in the head. When you come to, nothing but an ordinary building blueprint remains. You can't help but wonder if it was a hallucination.

Name: Building Blueprint IV
Text: Someone approaches you. Calling herself the Manga Artist that Never Procrastinates, she claims to have an extraordinary building blueprint, but you must give her some creative inspiration before you can have it.

Name: Building Blueprint IV
Text: "I didn't know I could paint with that..." That sounds familiar to you, but she is already lost in her own world. You take the blueprint and leave.

Name: Building Blueprint IV
Text: Seeing that you're unable to help, she vanishes into thin air before leaving behind an ordinary building blueprint. You can't help but wonder if it was a hallucination.

Name: Production Boost
Text: A manufacturer is promoting their product and offers us a sample of their Chakarat fertilizer. Perhaps we can produce more <color=#a46800>Coconuts</color>.

Name: Production Boost
Text: With ample sunlight and rainfall recently, the trees are thriving. Perhaps we can produce more <color=#a46800>Wood</color>.

Name: Production Boost
Text: The oil wells have been well-maintained recently. Perhaps we can produce more <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color>.

Name: Market Trend
Text: In a friendly soccer match, the Forsaken took a 7-0 win over the Babylonia, greatly boosting the sales of Forsaken Oasis <color=#a46800>Coconuts</color>, which are in high demand.

Name: Market Trend
Text: In a friendly soccer match, the Forsaken took a 7-0 win over the Babylonia, greatly boosting the sales of household goods endorsed by the Forsaken. <color=#a46800>Wood</color> is in high demand.

Name: Market Trend
Text: In a friendly soccer match, the Forsaken took a 7-0 win over the Babylonia, greatly boosting the sales of Forsaken player figurines. <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> is in high demand.

Name: Production Boost
Text: Our technicians are upgrading the production process. We can either make a major improvement to <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> production or make a minor adjustment to <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> production.

Name: Production Boost
Text: Our technicians are upgrading the production process. We can either make a major improvement to <color=#a46800>Wood</color> production or make a minor adjustment to <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> production.

Name: Production Boost
Text: Our technicians are upgrading the production process. We can either make a major improvement to <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> production or make a minor adjustment to <color=#a46800>Wood</color> production.

Name: Market Trend
Text: Our shrewd salespersons are holding a performance competition. For at least the next 2 quarters, they can either greatly raise the price of <color=#a46800>Coconuts</color> or slightly raise the price of <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color>.

Name: Market Trend
Text: Our shrewd salespersons are holding a performance competition. For at least the next 2 quarters, they can either greatly raise the price of <color=#a46800>Wood</color> or slightly raise the price of <color=#a46800>Coconuts</color>.

Name: Market Trend
Text: Our shrewd salespersons are holding a performance competition. For at least the next 2 quarters, they can either greatly raise the price of <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> or slightly raise the price of <color=#a46800>Wood</color>.

Name: Extra Amount, Extra Price
Text: Perhaps you could give the workers a bonus to activate them and boost up the productivity?

Name: Extra Amount, Extra Price
Text: As expected, the workers are treating the factory as their new home. No work is too hard. They await new tasks!

Name: Extra Amount, Extra Price
Text: The encouragement worked. The workers are asking for more tasks.

Name: Extra Amount, Extra Price
Text: Luxury cars, yachts, private villas... You think of the nice little things you don't have yet, and decide your employees will have to make do with what they have.

Name: Mutual Benefits
Text: Your partner suggests that you both focus on the development of your respective specialty product. This might raise the price of some goods, but will reduce your market share of other goods.

Name: Mutual Benefits
Text: Your partner lets you choose the goods first to thank you.

Name: Mutual Benefits
Text: Your partner compromises. You can decide the price of all goods, but only within a limited range.

Name: Ship Supplies
Text: A merchant ship docks at your island for supplies. Afterward, they offer you a portion of their goods as a thank you for your hospitality.

Name: Ship Supplies
Text: A merchant ship docks at your island for supplies. Afterward, they offer you a portion of their goods as a thank you for your hospitality.

Name: Ship Supplies
Text: A merchant ship docks at your island for supplies. Afterward, they offer you a portion of their goods as a thank you for your hospitality.

Name: Ship Supplies
Text: A merchant ship docks at your island for supplies. Afterward, they pay you extra fees as a thank you for your hospitality.

Name: Off-Course Ship
Text: A Kowloong merchant ship has gone off course and arrived at your island. They are in urgent need of supplies and would like to pay with either cargo or Golden Shells for your help.

Name: Off-Course Ship
Text: The caravan sold you some of their goods at a discount. You helped them as promised in return.

Name: Off-Course Ship
Text: The merchants don't have many Golden Shells as they have yet to sell their goods. Still, you receive your expected payment.

Name: Off-Course Ship
Text: An ARU merchant ship has gone off course and arrived at your island. They are in urgent need of supplies and would like to pay with either cargo or Golden Shells for your help.

Name: Off-Course Ship
Text: The caravan sold you some of their goods at a discount. You helped them as promised in return.

Name: Off-Course Ship
Text: The merchants don't have many Golden Shells as they have yet to sell their goods. Still, you receive your expected payment.

Name: Off-Course Ship
Text: An Akdilek merchant ship has gone off course and arrived at your island. They are in urgent need of supplies and would like to pay with either cargo or Golden Shells for your help.

Name: Off-Course Ship
Text: The caravan sold you some of their goods at a discount. You helped them as promised in return.

Name: Off-Course Ship
Text: The merchants don't have many Golden Shells as they have yet to sell their goods. Still, you receive your expected payment.

Name: Off-Course Ship
Text: A Forsaken merchant ship has gone off course and arrived at your island. They would like to exchange some of their equipment for supplies.

Name: Off-Course Ship
Text: You accept the equipment from their ship. It looks like it can be useful for production.

Name: Mysterious Merchant
Text: You walked into an impressive-looking shop and discovered quite a few nice items. The owner noticed you, and eagerly stood up to ask if he could help you.

Name: Mysterious Merchant
Text: You pointed at the floor, then signed a check and shoved it to the owner, letting them know that the store was yours now. Soon, you transformed the shop into a new factory to produce more goods.

Name: Mysterious Merchant
Text: The shop owner smiles happily. He carefully wraps the products you picked and walks with you for a long way before he finally returns.

Name: Mysterious Merchant
Text: You take full advantage of the store's free gifts before leaving satisfied.

Name: Wrecked Ship
Text: A merchant ship is caught in a storm and is about to sink. After rescuing the crew, you might be able to salvage some of the equipment, but there is not much time left. Your choice is:

Name: Wrecked Ship
Text: You find some prototype equipment in the central equipment room. It looks like it can help scale up production. The crew is deeply grateful and agrees to let you keep whatever you find.

Name: Wrecked Ship
Text: You come to the captain's vault and find some safes full of Golden Shells, which you bring back to the land. The captain is deeply grateful and agrees to let you keep whatever you find.

Name: Wrecked Ship
Text: You choose not to take risks, bringing back only the cargo on the deck. The crew is deeply grateful and agrees to let you keep whatever you find.

Name: Band Reunion
Text: A figure rushes to you, so fast that you can't even see who they are. You can only hear them mumbling things like "Please help me reunite my band", "I beg you" and "I'll do anything", but nothing makes any sense to you. What will you do?

Name: Band Reunion
Text: After getting a tip from you, the figure disappears in a hurry, leaving behind a few musical instruments.

Name: Band Disbanded
Text: "Do you really know what you are saying? Please, I don't want to get involved anymore." These words carry the weight of a thousand truths. The figure that has been pestering you disappears, leaving behind a lot of Golden Shells.

Name: Membership Promotion
Text: The Win-Win Bank's aggressive promotions have put the Island Auction House on edge. They decide to follow suit and start their own membership campaign.

Name: Auction
Text: The auction begins! Come and have a look! There will be three items today. For the first item, your decision is:

Name: Auction
Text: This one seems to be quite popular. Bidders keep offering new prices, and your bid is soon surpassed. Your decision is:

Name: Auction
Text: This one is indeed very popular, still attracting bids even at a high price. You'll have to dig deep into your pocket if you want to win. Your decision is:

Name: Auction
Text: This one seems to carry a magical allure. No one is giving up even if the current bid has surpassed the buyout price. Your decision is:

Name: Auction
Text: In an act of great courage, you offer the buyout price. The auction house is completely soundless. Satisfied, you look at the second item:

Name: Auction
Text: The heated bidding is over. You beat everyone and win the lot! It feels good to spend some pocket money. Invigorated, you look at the second item:

Name: Auction
Text: The heated bidding is over. You lose, though it's a narrow defeat. However, there is no time to mourn over your first loss, for the second item is here!

Name: Auction
Text: An expert will never get the first one. You decide to skip to the next item:

Name: Auction
Text: This one seems to be quite popular. Bidders keep offering new prices, and your bid is soon surpassed. Your decision is:

Name: Auction
Text: This one is indeed very popular, still attracting bids even at a high price. You'll have to dig deep into your pocket if you want to win. Your decision is:

Name: Auction
Text: This one seems to carry a magical allure. No one is giving up even if the current bid has surpassed the buyout price. Your decision is:

Name: Auction
Text: The auctioneer is stunned after hearing your bid. After a long pause, he finally blurts out, "Well, congratulations!" before slamming down the gavel and handing you the item with both hands, almost forgetting to bring out the third item:

Name: Auction
Text: The heated bidding is over. You beat everyone and win the lot. It feels so good to achieve a big goal with just a little money! Pleased, you look at the second item:

Name: Auction
Text: The heated bidding is over. You lose, though it's a narrow defeat. However, there is no time to mourn over your second loss, for the third item is here!

Name: Auction
Text: An expert will never get the second one, either. You decide to skip to the next item:

Name: Auction
Text: This one seems to be quite popular. Bidders keep offering new prices, and your bid is soon surpassed. Your decision is:

Name: Auction
Text: This one is indeed very popular, still attracting bids even at a high price. You'll have to dig deep into your pocket if you want to win. Your decision is:

Name: Auction
Text: This one seems to carry a magical allure. No one is giving up even if the current bid has surpassed the buyout price. Your decision is:

Name: Auction
Text: Everyone is surprised and can only watch you take the final lot.

Name: Auction
Text: The heated bidding is over. You beat everyone and win the lot! You are the champion!

Name: Auction
Text: The heated bidding is over, so is your auction.

Name: Auction
Text: An expert will never get the last one. Not because they don't have the money.

Text: This one seems to be quite popular. Bidders keep offering new prices, and your bid is soon surpassed. Your decision is:

Name: Auction
Text: This one is indeed very popular, still attracting bids even at a high price. You'll have to dig deep into your pocket if you want to win. Your decision is:

Name: Auction
Text: This one seems to carry a magical allure. No one is giving up even if the current bid has surpassed the buyout price. Your decision is:

Name: Auction
Text: Everyone is surprised and can only watch you take the final lot.

Name: Auction
Text: The heated bidding is over. You beat everyone and win the lot! You are the champion!

Name: Auction
Text: The heated bidding is over, so is your auction.

Name: Auction
Text: An expert will never get the last one. Not because they don't have the money.

Name: Auction
Text: The auction begins! Come and have a look! There will be three items today. For the first item, your decision is:

Name: Auction
Text: This one seems to be quite popular. Bidders keep offering new prices, and your bid is soon surpassed. Your decision is:

Name: Auction
Text: This one is indeed very popular, still attracting bids even at a high price. You'll have to dig deep into your pocket if you want to win. Your decision is:

Name: Auction
Text: This one seems to carry a magical allure. No one is giving up even if the current bid has surpassed the buyout price. Your decision is:

Name: Auction
Text: In an act of great courage, you offer the buyout price. The auction house is completely soundless. Satisfied, you look at the second item:

Name: Auction
Text: The heated bidding is over. You beat everyone and win the lot! It feels good to spend some pocket money. Invigorated, you look at the second item:

Name: Auction
Text: The heated bidding is over. You lose, though it's a narrow defeat. However, there is no time to mourn over your first loss, for the second item is here!

Name: Auction
Text: An expert will never get the first one. You decide to skip to the next item:

Name: Auction
Text: This one seems to be quite popular. Bidders keep offering new prices, and your bid is soon surpassed. Your decision is:

Name: Auction
Text: This one is indeed very popular, still attracting bids even at a high price. You'll have to dig deep into your pocket if you want to win. Your decision is:

Name: Auction
Text: This one seems to carry a magical allure. No one is giving up even if the current bid has surpassed the buyout price. Your decision is:

Name: Auction
Text: The auctioneer is stunned after hearing your bid. After a long pause, he finally blurts out, "Well, congratulations!" before slamming down the gavel and handing you the item with both hands, almost forgetting to bring out the third item:

Name: Auction
Text: The heated bidding is over. You beat everyone and win the lot. It feels so good to achieve a big goal with just a little money! Pleased, you look at the second item:

Name: Auction
Text: The heated bidding is over. You lose, though it's a narrow defeat. However, there is no time to mourn over your second loss, for the third item is here!

Text: The heated bidding is over, so is your auction.

Name: Auction
Text: An expert will never get the last one. Not because they don't have the money.

Name: Membership Promotion
Text: Win-Win Bank grand opening special offer! Become a member now for generous rewards!

Name: Membership Rebate
Text: Win-Win Bank client appreciation event! Amazing rewards for all members!

Name: Membership Promotion
Text: Win-Win Bank grand opening special offer! Become a member now for generous rewards!

Name: Investment Guru
Text: High risk, high reward! Invest Golden Shells now to get rewarded next quarter! Faced with a golden opportunity to fly high (or fly high and then hit the ground hard), you decide to:

Name: Investment Guru
Text: After careful calculations, you make an investment and leave with hope. Wait for the good news next quarter.

Name: Investment Guru
Text: Your gut feeling tells you this is a fraud, and you leave immediately.

Name: Investment Guru
Text: You invested 10000 Golden Shells. Everything in moderation. Which investment strategy would you like to adopt?

Name: Investment Guru
Text: You invested 30% of your Golden Shells. Sometimes you have to go big! Which investment strategy would you like to adopt?

Name: Investment Guru
Text: High risk, high reward! Invest Golden Shells now to get rewarded next quarter! Faced with a golden opportunity to fly high (or fly high and then hit the ground hard), you decide to:

Name: Investment Guru
Text: After careful calculations, you make an investment and leave with hope. Wait for the good news next quarter.

Name: Investment Guru
Text: Your gut feeling tells you this is a fraud, and you leave immediately.

Name: Investment Guru
Text: You invested 50000 Golden Shells. Everything in moderation. Which investment strategy would you like to adopt?

Name: Investment Guru
Text: You invested 40% of your Golden Shells. Sometimes you have to go big! Which investment strategy would you like to adopt?

Name: Investment Guru
Text: High risk, high reward! Invest Golden Shells now to get rewarded next quarter! Faced with a golden opportunity to fly high (or fly high and then hit the ground hard), you decide to:

Name: Investment Guru
Text: After careful calculations, you make an investment and leave with hope. Wait for the good news next quarter.

Name: Investment Guru
Text: Your gut feeling tells you this is a fraud, and you leave immediately.

Name: Investment Guru
Text: You invested 150000 Golden Shells. Everything in moderation. Which investment strategy would you like to adopt?

Name: Investment Guru
Text: You invested 50% of your Golden Shells. Sometimes you have to go big! Which investment strategy would you like to adopt?

Name: Investment Guru
Text: High risk, high reward! Invest Golden Shells now to get rewarded next quarter! Faced with a golden opportunity to fly high (or fly high and then hit the ground hard), you decide to:

Name: Investment Guru
Text: After careful calculations, you make an investment and leave with hope. Wait for the good news next quarter.

Name: Investment Guru
Text: Your gut feeling tells you this is a fraud, and you leave immediately.

Name: Investment Guru
Text: You invested 150000 Golden Shells. Everything in moderation. Which investment strategy would you like to adopt?

Name: Investment Guru
Text: You invested 50% of your Golden Shells. Sometimes you have to go big! Which investment strategy would you like to adopt?

Name: Tutorial
Text: Take these Golden Shells as your startup resources.

Name: Tutorial
Text: I suggest you to buy more <color=#a46800>Coconuts</color>. Believe me! You'll not regret it!

Name: Qi Refining Concreting
Text: The start of the concreting journey. You can knock down three tree trunks in one go without breaking a sweat.

Name: Foundation Establishment Concreting
Text: After seasons of training, you have advanced to a higher concreting stage. Now you can move half a ton of bricks with bare hands and are officially on track.

Name: Golden Core Concreting
Text: You have infused your concreting energy into the core and broken the concreting limit. Now you can stick hundreds of steel pillars into the wall just by raising your hand!

Name: Nascent Soul Concreting
Text: As you ascend into a higher realm, you gain the power to unleash your concreting power within, mixing a hundred tons of concrete with a wave of your hand.

Name: Deity Transformation Concreting
Text: After seasons of hard training, you have reached your first concreting realm milestone. Now you can harness the concreting energy in the air. No need to worry about getting exhausted anymore!

Name: Spatial Tempering Concreting
Text: You become more adept at harnessing the concreting power in the air. You can build multiple mountain tunnels in an instant without breaking a sweat.

Name: Body Integration Concreting
Text: As you repeatedly mix concrete, you have come to understand the fundamental principles of concreting energy generation. Now you can conjure high-density concreting energy out of thin air.

Name: Great Perfection Concreting
Text: After years of concreting training, you have successfully mastered the rules of concreting energy generation and reached the peak of your concreting journey. Now you can move mountains, fill seas, and build hundreds of high-rises in a blink of an eye

Name: Tribulation Transcendence Concreting
Text: The final stop of the concreting journey. Now you can break a star just by lifting your finger! However, you feel this is not the end of the journey yet. There is still room for improvement!

Name: Concreting Celestial
Text: Thousands of years later, you successfully find the space node of the universe, break the void, and transcend!

Name: Back to the Ordinary
Text: "Hey! You over there! Enough for noon break! Now get these bricks to the island!"

Name: Recycling Center
Text: On the W-shaped island, you come across a recycling center, where an old recycling robot is sorting out piles of wastes. It heard that there is hot lava on the Polarized Island and wants you to have a look there so that it can start another branch. It promises remuneration when it's done.

Name: Recycling Center
Text: After exploration, you tell the robot about the environment over there. As remuneration, it takes out a building blueprint from a broken safe box and gives it to you.

Name: Education Center
Text: Just a fair amount of Golden Shells and you will get a lot of experience!

Name: Education Center
Text: Hmm, you have improved. You need to pay more if you want to continue!

Name: New Branch
Text: Sophia and Changyu come to consult you about an issue. It has been a while since the opening of the Akdilek branch, but there were a few customers. They hope you can come up with an idea to help them promote the store in the area.

Name: New Branch
Text: "Your decision was a success. After the online promotion, the store is packed with travelers both inside and outside. However, these travelers value online reviews. To keep the "best store" verification, Changyu has to spend extra time preparing Kowloong snacks as gifts for them. Both of you are exhausted after the hustle."

Name: New Branch
Text: You went for a low-margin, high-volume strategy to maintain the store's reputation among locals, and it turned out to be a success. The Akdilek branch quickly became a nice store among local people. Many old customers come back every day. However, these customers are quite sensitive to prices. Sophia racks her brains every day to keep the costs under control and make sure there's no inventory backlog. Both of you are exhausted after the hustle.

Name: New Branch Management
Text: A while later, Sophia and Changyu come to you again. Your strategy worked last time, but given the number of staff, everyone would be worn out in a few days. To prevent this, they would like you to give them some suggestion.

Name: New Branch Management
Text: "You decided to face the difficulty head-on by scaling up and hiring new staff. Although it's hard for the old staff to adjust, it would bring more revenue once everybody's used to it. Sophia is satisfied with your proposal."

Name: New Branch Management
Text: You thought everyone should have some rest before taking the next move. After some rest, everybody realizes that the rearrangement of shifts and the rotation system can really improve work efficiency. This way you solve the problem without extra costs. Sophia looks happy these days.

Name: Getting On Track
Text: The island branch's operation is getting on track, but several representatives of the local chamber of commerce come at your door, asking you to pay an additional supporting fund with the excuse of "your business has hindered the development of local business." Your response to this is...

Name: Getting On Track
Text: You tell them that their request is ridiculous and would rather move to another place. Although it will cost a considerable amount of money, you don't want the representatives to have what they want.

Name: Getting On Track
Text: Although their request is outrageous, given that the branch just got on track, you think the priority here is to keep the store and decide to give them the money.

Name: Getting On Track
Text: You show the detailed operation data of the Akdilek branch to them to prove that it has not hindered the development of local business. Instead, it has brought a huge number of customers and driven the development of the area. Fellow buisiness owners on the island also speak up for you, asking the representatives to go. The representatives have to leave empty-handed. Seeing things get settled properly, Sophia and Changyu look at you in awe.

Name: Boosting Reputation
Text: The island branch's business is booming. The original space is not enough, so you ask Karenina to help you expand it. Karenina agrees without hesitation, but she needs more building materials and asks you to help her collect them.

Name: Boosting Reputation
Text: You and Karenina arrive at the beach to collect some <color=#a46800>Coconuts</color> and <color=#a46800>Wood</color> to be used as building materials. The waves keep hitting the shore, and the bright sunlight makes it hard for you to open your eyes. After a whole afternoon of hard work, both you and Karenina are tanned. However, Karenina is not mad at all. She looks happy.

Name: Boosting Reputation
Text: You and Karenina arrive at the mountain to collect some old wood to be used as the building material. The rainforest is full of mosquitoes and bugs. Only one afternoon and both of you are covered in mosquito bites, but thankfully you've gotten enough materials.

Name: Boosting Reputation
Text: You and Karenina made the materials into beams. She comes to you for advice on decoration style before getting started.

Name: Boosting Reputation
Text: "Are you sure...? Never mind. I guess it would be eye-catching." Hearing your request, Karenina looks a bit confused, but she accepts it anyway and turns the store into a princess-themed space.

Name: Boosting Reputation
Text: "Am I right? Speaking of a beach store, the common tropical style is the best!" You agree on it right away and turn the branch into a place featuring strong tropical elements. The travelers love the design as well, and your store has quickly become a famous photo spot by the sea.

Name: Fairytale Store
Text: Soon, the fairytale store by the sea has drawn the attention of many social media users. A famous photographer reaches out to you, hoping you can close for one day to let him use the space as a photo studio. But of course, it would be free, and he won't pay you anything.

Name: Fairytale Store
Text: The photographer took many gorgeous promo photos for you. As the designers of the space, you and Karenina become famous. More and more people come to take photos. However, there's always an interesting expression on Karenina's face every time when she hears someone praising the store.

Name: Fairytale Store
Text: You politely let the cameraman know that you don't want to lose a day's earnings. They think it's a pity, but respect your decision.

Name: Fairytale Store
Text: You show the photographer a better spot for taking shots. He finds the view absolutely stunning, just as you have said. As a token of gratitude, he posts a review of your store on his personal social media account, in which he gives it the highest compliment. Your store has gone viral.

Name: Ordinary Store
Text: Soon, the Akdilek branch store becomes a famous tourist attraction on the island. A net channel wants to interview you, but you will have to close the store for one day. Of course, you won't get paid for this. They don't offer any financial compensation.

Name: Ordinary Store
Text: The channel filmed an elaborate introduction program for you. As the designers of the space, you and Karenina become famous. More and more people come to travel here. Although Karenina didn't say it, you notice that she's happy with her work. She's even more straightforward when speaking to you in the following days.

Name: Ordinary Store
Text: You politely let the contact person know that you don't want to lose a day's earnings. They think it's a pity, but respect your decision.

Name: Ordinary Store
Text: You suggest them to film the staff as well, since you're gonna close one day. Besides, you know a place with breathtaking views that is suitable for outdoor interviews. The channel accepts your advice, and the result turns out to be amazing. The store has become a store with a human touch among netizens, which brings more visitors to the store.

Name: Laying the Pipeline
Text: The store has attracted many new customers after the expansion, and your supplies are not enough to meet the demand. To optimize the pipeline, you ask Ayla, who has rich experience in this, to be your consultant. After careful assessment, she suggests to build a logistics network to secure the following supplies. She also asks if you would like to bring in the local chamber of commerce, which would save you half the effort.

Name: Laying the Pipeline
Text: Considering the previous gangster behavior of the local chamber of commerce, you decide to build the logistics network yourselves.

Name: Laying the Pipeline
Text: You ask the chamber of commerce that threatened you if they want to share the logistics network with you regardless. The representatives didn't expect you to be this generous. Feeling ashamed, they tell you the truththey only asked for the additional supporting fund to maintain the operation because the island is far away from the continent and the transportation is poor. If there can be a logistics network, they swear they will never do it again and will return the money to the business owners.

Name: Independent Construction
Text: Under Ayla's leadership, the construction of the logistics network has soon passed the halfway mark. One day, the representatives of the local chamber of commerce visit you with some gifts. They would like to apologize and hope you can allow them to join the network. Feeling ashamed, they tell you the truththey only asked for the additional supporting fund to maintain the operation because the island is far away from the continent and the transportation is poor. If there can be a logistics network, they swear they will never do it again and will return the money to the business owners.

Name: Independent Construction
Text: You politely tell them that you have no intention to bring in partners at the moment. They look embarrassed but soon realize that they're paying for what they did and leave. After hearing everything from you, Ayla also agrees that it's not the right time to have more people onboard and you should focus on the construction.

Name: Independent Construction
Text: You generously accept their request and introduce them to Ayla the same day. Seeing the new partners, Ayla looks happy and is glad to have more assistance when she's buried in work and wishes the cats could help her if possible.

Name: Joint Construction
Text: Having heard that you're building a logistics network with the local chamber of commerce, business owners in the area all come to you and Ayla, asking you to allow them use it after it's completed. It turns out that the economic development of the island has been hindered by the poor transportation. They hope they can take this opportunity to break the limits and escape the rat race here on the island.

Name: Joint Construction
Text: "You think for a moment and agree because having them onboard will recover some of your costs. The business owners thank you in excitement." "I didn't expect you to be this clever. Turns out you are the right person for management!" "After hearing everything, Ayla gives you a thumbs-up of appreciation."

Name: Joint Construction
Text: You think for a moment and refuse them because you don't know them very well and don't want any unnecessary issues at the moment. The business owners leave with regrets.

Name: Independent Construction Completed
Text: The newly constructed logistics network has facilitated the transportation on the island. To thank you for your efforts, Ayla holds a small celebration dinner party and invites everyone in the store. Everyone has a good time at the party.

Name: Independent Construction Completed
Text: You all had fun at the party. Later, Ayla feels tired and drags you to the beach for a walk. You spend some peaceful and warm time together in the golden sunset and the echoes of the waves.

Name: Joint Construction Completed
Text: The newly constructed logistics network has facilitated the transportation on the island. Under your help, many business owners on the island have used and benefited from it. One day, they come to invite you and Ayla to a party to thank you for building such a convenient network. At the party, you see a familiar figure leaving quietly...

Name: Joint Construction Completed
Text: There were too many people at the party. You gave up, knowing that there's no way to catch up with that figure. Later, Ayla feels tired and drags you to the beach for a walk. You spend some peaceful and warm time together in the golden sunset and the echoes of the waves.

Name: Joint Construction Completed
Text: According to the roads you recorded during the construction, you take a shortcut and catch up with that figure. It's one of the representatives who blackmailed you. He thought he's not qualified to attend the party, so he planned to return the money to everybody's store secretly while they're celebrating. He thanks you for the changes you brought to the island and leaves.

Name: Here Comes a New Helper!
Text: "How can you go on an adventure without me, Commandant? I'm here to help you!" Nanami suddenly appears with her machine friends in front of everyone, swearing to show her capabilities in the island branch. Nanami and her machine friends are all capable and strong. Think carefully about what tasks to assign them.

Name: Here Comes a New Helper!
Text: You think you can have several mechanoids bringing in customers from the streets, and it would definitely be perfect propaganda, so you ask Nanami to advertise your store on the streets. "Bring everyone together, right? Got it!" Nanami makes a V sign and skates away.

Name: Here Comes a New Helper!
Text: Considering mechanoids are more efficient in transporting things than humans, you ask Nanami to collect some materials that the branch could use. "Collect materials in mountains and on beaches, right? Got it!" Nanami makes a V sign and skates away.

Name: Super Promoter
Text: Nanami's promotion strategy worked. The customers in the island branch have multiplied in just a few days. However, to your surprise, most of them are mechanoids who were always refused by other stores with the excuse of "not capable of hosting mechanoids." Nanami told them they're welcomed here, and it gives them a sense of belonging here.

Name: Super Promoter
Text: You ask Nanami if it is necessary to open a new branch for mechanoid customers, but she thinks there's no need to do this. She understands that your intention is good, but it would make them feel distant. Just keep it as it is and treat them as normal customers.

Name: Super Promoter
Text: More and more mechanoid customers are coming to the store, but the human staff are not able to understand their needs very well. You find Nanami and ask her for suggestions. She tells you right away that you need to hire some mechanoid staff. You give it some thought and think it's a plausible solution.

Name: Super Collector
Text: A while later, several stranger mechanoids come at your door. They saw Nanami and some mechanoids working on the island and want to see if you can take them in as well. According to them, they've been wandering around the coastal area for years since they were abandoned by humans. All they want now is a shelter, so they are willing to work for free.

Name: Super Collector
Text: It's not bad to help more mechanoids, and the store needs more staff anyway. You accept it, and the mechanoids become staff of your branch.

Name: Super Collector
Text: You refuse and tell them they should have their own salaries. You will pay them according to their performance. The mechanoids are moved by your words with clear condensation liquid coming down from their broken camera eyes.

Name: Super Friendship Store
Text: "There is a store where humans and mechanoids can be together on friendly terms." This is a widespread rumor on the island. Your store has become not only the favorite gathering spot for residents, but also the home for many homeless mechanoids. Nanami is happy with the outcome, because she has finally realized the dream she had for a long time and that is having mechanoids and humans live together in harmony. "So, what next?" She asks, looking at you.

Name: Super Friendship Store
Text: "Yeah, the store is now the home of many friends. We must keep it safe and sound." Nanami makes a pinky swear with you, meaning she will never forget her promise.

Name: Super Friendship Store
Text: "More?" Nanami looks at you in surprise and expectation. You then describe a wonderful picture of the future. There are still quite a few vacant lots on the island. You can turn them into stores and provide stable jobs to more mechanoids... "Yes. I believe we can do this!" Nanami gives you a smile of appreciation after you finish explaining the grand conception.

Name: Super Friendly Store
Text: "There is a store where humans and mechanoids can be together on friendly terms." This is a widespread rumor on the island. Your store has become not only the favorite gathering spot for residents, but also the home for Nanami and her friends. "So, what next?" She asks, looking at you.

Name: Super Friendly Store
Text: "Yeah, the store is now the home of Rohacchi and Martin. We must keep it safe and sound." Nanami makes a pinky swear with you, meaning she will never forget her promise.

Name: Final Test
Text: "You seem to be having fun. Can I be part of it?" Somehow, Ishmael shows up at your store. Dressed like a tourist and wearing a sun hat, she looks like someone on vacation. Still, she is offering to help. Her usual calm smile is putting you under pressure. No doubt she is here to test you! But for what?

Name: Final Test
Text: You tell Ishmael honestly that there's no job vacancies at the moment and you don't need help. However, she doesn't seem to care and stays anyway, saying that she will find things to do here.

Name: Final Test
Text: You find a position for her. She doesn't refuse you when she knows what the position is, but she tells you that she may act on her will and arrange work according to her preference.

Name: Final Test II
Text: It has been a while since Ishmael started working freely in the store, except that "working" here means strolling leisurely on the island most of the time. One day, she asks you for some work buddies. You agree. So who are you going to send to accompany Ishmael?

Name: Final Test II
Text: Sophia and Changyu took Ishmael to the beach. They created a huge but delicate super sand castle and took a group photo with Ishmael before the castle got pushed over by the waves. "You cherish the sand castle when you create it because you know it's gonna be destroyed." Ishmael tells you this after she's back from the beach.

Name: Final Test II
Text: Ayla and Karenina take Ishmael to dive around the coral reef... They come across a great white shark on the way. However, it flees just when Ayla and Karenina are ready to fight. "Did we just get lucky... or the sharks here are nicer?" Ishmael doesn't seem to have noticed that the shark was scared away by herself.

Name: Final Test III
Text: A few days later, Ishmael invites you to spend a day out with her. Together, you explore all the famous attractions and amusement rides on the island, dive into the sea to admire the coral reefs, and collect seashells on the beach. As the sunset paints the sky and ocean into the same crimson color, she finally confesses that, at first, her visit was meant to be an assessment of the shop's business, but it somehow turned into a leisurely vacation. She is grateful for everything you have done to let her enjoy this journey. However, this brief escape must come to an end, and it is time for her to say goodbye. What do you want to say to her at this moment...?

Name: Final Test III
Text: "Yeah. It's great that you also had fun." She slightly presses her straw hat and gazes into the distance beyond the sea. "I will never forget this summer."

Name: Final Test III
Text: You remember there's a beautiful spot on the island that you forgot to add to the itinerary, so you decide to take her to that mountain before sunset. Watching the sun set slowly into the sea from the top of the mountain is amazing. "Although I've seen many sceneries, this one is still the best sunset I've ever seen." She looks back at you with her face in the shadow against the light behind her. "Thank you for everything. I will never forget this summer."

Name: Coconut Thief
Text: There have been cases of coconuts going missing in the factory. You suspect that there is a thief but fail to catch them after staking out for days.

Name: Coconut Thief
Text: The expert you hired is very efficient and quickly catches a worn-out coconut transport mechanoid. Its chip seems to have been damaged, making it steal coconuts to the hidden basement. The expert suggests you to melt and recycle it.

Name: Coconut Thief
Text: The increasing investment cost has impacted the coconut production. You decide to give up and observe.

Name: Coconut Thief
Text: You untie the mechanoid and follow it to a hidden basement filled with coconuts.

Name: Coconut Thief
Text: You finally catch the thief after months of hard work. You throw it into the recycling facility with the crane in anger.

Name: French Fries and Time
Text: You come across a less crowded part of the beach. A low machine voice suddenly comes from above, "However, the strange thing is..." A machine sea gull lands on your shoulder, "When I watch the ebbs and flows over and over again for 8800 natures, I witness the births and deaths of numerous creatures. Now please tell me, human, do we still have freedom before the ruthless nature?"

Name: French Fries and Time
Text: The sea gull gets lost in thought. From that day on, it often lands on your shoulder and discusses its latest thoughts with you. Gradually, your discussions have attracted many travelers and become one of the uniqiue scenes here.

Name: French Fries and Time
Text: "No, you have also fallen into the hedonic trap of consumerism," the sea gull looks angry, "Wait. I will think of an idea to make you realize the importance of freedom." Then, it quickly flaps its wings and flies into the distance.

Name: French Fries and Time II
Text: The sea gull by your side becomes famous. The WGAA has granted the honorary degree of bachelor to it and invites it to seminars in different locations. Your old friend is also generous with good words about you in public places, claiming that you are the one who brought it into the temple of speculative thinking, which has greatly increased the reputation of the branch.

Name: French Fries and Time II
Text: In the following days, the machine sea gull hovers above the beach, calling every passerby to think about the nature of existence. The unique scene has attracted many travelers. Some suggest you to seize the opportunity. You open a French fries shop on the island, and the business is booming.

Name: Bliss
Text: You come across a strange old man who sits on the cold shore all day gazing at the horizon affectionately. You sit down beside him, listening to his story. He was a soldier who fell in love with a Construct comrade. For years, he had been expressing his love indirectly without any response from her. Now, he's already an old man, but he still believes that one day, the Construct will understand him and come to him as a response to his love.

Name: Bliss
Text: The old man smiles and nods with his eyes still fixed to the sea under the sunset. He says, "She said she needed some time to think about it. And I'm willing to wait, even though I'm a human, even though we are destined to live in different times." Then, he takes you to his house and lets you pick one item from his loot to keep.

Name: Bliss
Text: The old man doesn't respond. He watches the sun setting into the sea and then leaves silently. No one has seen him ever since.

Name: Bliss II
Text: The old man by the sea passed away. Long after, a silver-hair girl finds you. It turns out she is the Construct that old man pursued. She comes to the island after receiving his will. She hopes you can turn his house into a museum to let everyone remember the history of the Post-Pandemic Age. As for herself, she will get back to the fight and prolong the traces of their existence with the rest of her life.

Name: Bliss II
Text: Today, you receive a letter from the old man by the sea. Inspired by your words, he decides to set off to find the Construct he loves. He sold the property by auction and donated all his collection to the chamber of commerce.

Name: Safe Evacuation
Text: Just now, three muscle men suddenly appeared on the street, claiming to be junior high students from the Golden Age. Now they need to borrow your vehicle to solve the big crisis in the solar system.

Name: Safe Evacuation
Text: They look at you in gratitude. In this world lacking in childlike innocence, you're one of the few adults who would believe them. They get on the vehicle noisily and drive into the distance. The ridiculous scene has attracted many travelers to the store.

Name: Safe Evacuation
Text: Hearing your refusal, they hang their heads in disappointment. They wander sadly on the strange street and then disappear in the crowd.

Name: Safe Evacuation II
Text: A vehicle suddenly stops before you. Three muscle men step off. They claim to have accomplished their mission of the Reconquista Age and that they will soon return to the Golden Age. Before leaving, they hug you tightly and whisper, "You're none like other adults. You've made the world a better place." This touching moment is snapshotted by the WGAA and increases the branch's reputation. Where did those guys come from? You have no idea, but it's certain that you helped out three innocent souls that day and made the world a better place.

Name: Safe Evacuation II
Text: You submit the story of you and the three muscle men you came across the other day to the WGAA. A director is inspired by this and films a great movie based on it.

Name: Mahjong Legend
Text: A sudden rain breaks your plan. To shelter from rain, you push open the gate of a mahjong parlor nearby. There are three people sitting insidetwo ferocious-looking muscle men and one silver-hair young man. All of them are looking at you. "Wanna join us?"

Name: Mahjong Legend
Text: You sit down for a few games. The white-haired young man keeps winning, getting big hands every time. The two burly men grow furious, flipping the table and starting a fight. As the parlor's owner steps in, the young man takes the chance to slip away, vanishing into the rain. Seeing that the two men are quite strong, you offer to hire them as day laborers.

Name: Mahjong Legend
Text: The three of them all have a menacing look. Clearly they are up to no good! You quickly leave the mahjong parlor, filing a report as you do. Outside the parlor, you happen to witness a fruit truck turning over in the rain. After helping the farmer gather their fruit, they give you some fruit as a thank-you gift.

Name: Mahjong Legend II
Text: Unexpectedly, you receive an anonymous letter. The words on it are pieced together from newspaper clippings. The sender has gathered complaints about your management from your employees, whom they claim to play mahjong with, and urge you to address the issues properly. At the end of the letter, they write: "As long as you stay away from the mahjong table, you'll never lose."

Name: Mahjong Legend II
Text: Your recent report received great attention from the authorities. After investigating, they found out that the white-haired young man you encountered was none other than the most wanted criminal on the island. Nicknamed "the Genius Mahjong Sage", he had been making money by cheating on the mahjong table for years. Your contribution in solving the case has earned you official commendation, and the popularity of your branch store has soared.

Name: Hero's Guitar
Text: You come across a girl playing guitar alone on the streetside. She looks nervous and keeps avoiding eye contact with passersby. You can feel the passion in her music, but despite the street being busy with people, no one would stop to appreciate a dream chaser.

Name: Hero's Guitar
Text: Being the skilled guitarist that you are, seeing her embarrassment, you can't help but step in and teach her everything you know. She is deeply grateful and invites you to her band's upcoming gig.

Name: Hero's Guitar
Text: Your words of encouragement seem to give her confidence. She looks more relaxed, and her music becomes brighter, attracting more and more people to listen and tip. After the performance, she insists on splitting her earnings with you.

Name: Hero's Guitar II
Text: You show up at the guitarist girl's gig as promised. She and her bandmates perform in perfect harmony, and the audience is captivated. After the show, she comes to you and offers to be the brand ambassador of your branch store.

Name: Hero's Guitar II
Text: One day, you recognize the guitarist girl on a roadside screen. It turns out she has become famous after an outstanding performance. In the interview, she says it is your encouragement that has given her the strength to keep playing. Your branch store has become more popular because of this.

Name: Endless Month
Text: All of a sudden, you hear someone having a heated debate outside your store. Looking over, you see two students at the door. A girl, with her arms crossed, insists that superhumans exist, while a boy with a troubled face shakes his head in disagreement. Seeing you approach, the girl demands your verdict - are superhumans real?

Name: Endless Month
Text: Of course, they are! Actually, you have seen quite a few superhumans yourself. The girl jumps with excitement at your answer. She then recruits you into a mysterious group called the QOQ Brigade. Thrilled, she promises to keep in touch.

Name: Endless Month
Text: "Stick to science, not superstition!" Hearing your reply, the girl looks upset and turns away without saying a word. The boy is grateful, though. He even shows you the location of a high-quality forest area on the island that is only known to a few.

Name: Endless Month II
Text: One day, the five members of the QOQ Brigade visit your store for a team-building session. Afterward, they ask to use your place as a regular meeting space and offer to work in your branch store free of charge in return. You agree to their request. Although the five students are a bit clumsy, their youthful energy and enthusiasm have made your branch store a much better workplace.

Name: Endless Month II
Text: Customers cry out in surprise around the TV in your store. The screen shows a girl standing on a rooftop. Upon closer inspection, you realize it's the same "superhuman girl" you met a few days ago! She loudly proclaims herself as the protagonist of the world before leaping off the edge. Luckily, she lands safely on an air cushion and is taken away by a group of men in black. You never find out what becomes of her, but her eccentric behavior draws an influx of curious visitors to the island, boosting your business.

Name: Dogs Are the Best
Text: You hold your breath. You have been locking eyes with your adversary for quite some time. This black puppy has come out of nowhere and set his sights on the half-eaten sausage in your hand. He firmly plants himself in your path, but neither barks nor growls. Instead, he simply stares at you - and your food - with wide puppy eyes, occasionally swallowing saliva. What a brilliant strategy! Who could possibly resist those eyes?

Name: Dogs Are the Best
Text: Finally, you admit defeat and offer your sausage to the black puppy. He sniffs cautiously, making sure that you won't pull it back, before carefully taking it with his mouth and devouring it. When he's done, he looks up again, and you can swear his face has brightened. Gently tugging at the bottom of your trousers, he leads you to a hidden spot. The cave he must have dug out is filled with trinkets. Some of them are actually rare and interesting. Wagging his tail happily, he seems to be inviting you to pick something from his collection.

Name: Dogs Are the Best
Text: You win! You have withstood the puppy's assault! You finish off the sausage in a few bites. The puppy stares at you in amazement, as if he never expected you to have such unwavering determination.

Name: Dogs Are the Best
Text: Perhaps out of fondness for his benefactor, the puppy continues bringing you peculiar trinkets from time to time. Occasionally, you would find something useful.

Name: Dogs Are the Best
Text: Perhaps out of admiration for the strong, the black puppy keeps appearing wherever you go, as if waiting for a chance to prove himself - and he finally has it! This day, you are walking down the street and examining a new product when a figure dashes out, snatches the item from your hands, and takes off running. Before you can shout "Thief!", a dark blur streaks past you with lightning speed, leaps onto the thief, and tackles them to the ground. It's none other than the black puppy. From this day on, he has earned his place at your doorstep. His heroic feat has impressed not only you but also passersby, drawing more customers to your business.

Name: Preparing for the Exhibition
Text: The Chamber of Commerce plans to host a trade fair. This is a once-in-a-lifetime for you to promote your goods, and you will probably make a great fortune if things go well. However, the current production capacity and quality of your goods are not enough to win you a better booth location. What should you do?

Name: Preparing for the Exhibition
Text: You decided to go all out and announced a short-term order, asking all employees to work overtime. In the end, you successfully secured a central spot at the trade fair, but many staff fell ill, which made it difficult for you to maintain the production levels for quite some time.

Name: Preparing for the Exhibition
Text: The trade fair is held every year, so there is no need for you to take the risk and rush it. You decide to stick to your own pace; if you can't secure a central spot, just go for one at the side. As long as you participate in the trade fair, you will still benefit from it.

Name: Preparing for the Exhibition II
Text: The trade fair was successfully held. The presentation of your products was chosen to be the grand finale of the event, and had left a deep impression on the attendees. The popularity of your products quickly increased, bringing you a significant profit.

Name: Preparing for the Exhibition II
Text: The trade fair was successfully held. While your booth was not in the most prominent location, the solid quality of your products still left a positive impression on the attendees, which also boosted your sales.

Name: Secret Sweat Factory
Text: You accidentally stepped into a factory. The workshop was filled with crude equipment, filthy raw materials, soulless workers, and packing boxes half-submerged in muddy water. The factory owner just looked at you with a sly grin, arms crossed. "Don't be so surprised, my lord." He then added, "How about we work together? I provide the manpower and goods for sale, and you use your existing channels to sell them. It's a win-win dealyou get to win twice."

Name: Secret Sweat Factory
Text: The law enforcement quickly arrived. Even when the owner was shoved into the car, he was still smiling at you. When you looked him in the eye, he opened his mouth wide to say "see you later" silently. His face felt really familiar, but you could not recall where you had seen him before.

Name: Secret Sweat Factory
Text: The owner appeared to be shocked when you agreed immediately. After confirming multiple times, he finally reached a hand out after staring at you for quite some time.

Name: Secret Sweat Factory II
Text: You received widespread praise for reporting the sweat factory, and your goods quickly gained popularity. Still, you could not understand why that owner approached you, and why he remained calm even when taken away. Also, what did he mean by "see you later"?

Name: Secret Sweat Factory II
Text: Your cooperation with the sweat factory was soon exposed. Even your loyal customers felt betrayed and reported your business. To calm things down, you had to urgently drop the prices of your products and announce to cut ties with the factory, assuring everyone that you would maintain the same high standards in raw materials and craftsmanship.

Name: Distant Dream
Text: An old man is giving a speech by the roadside. With his hands waving passionately, he praises the vastness of the universe and claims the one and only dream in this world is located just 350 kilometers away above the earth's surface. He has prepared for decades and is very close to discovering the ultimate secret of the universe! Unfortunately, he has run out of research funding. If only some Good Samaritan could lend him a hand.

Name: Distant Dream
Text: You generously sponsored the old man's project. He was extremely grateful and promised to invest all the funds in the research. He said he would never forget your kindness, and would make sure not to disappoint you.

Name: Distant Dream
Text: While you said you did not believe in the old man, you still listened to the entire speech and expressed your verbal support. After all, it was good to have a dream. Hope he could find someone willing to sponsor him.

Name: Distant Dream II
Text: You were awakened by long-lasting cheers. Countless reports had gathered outside your place, asking to meet you in person. You spent a lot of effort trying to figure out what happened and finally realized that the old man you sponsored before had finally published a paper on space research, which made a critical breakthrough and shocked the entire academic world. During his interviews, he mentioned your support multiple times, expressing his deep gratitude. This became the best advertisement for you; people praised your generosity and promised to support your business.

Name: Distant Dream II
Text: You heard that the old man who gave the speech finally found another sponsor and published an important research paper that shocked the entire academic world. To your surprise, he had not forgotten youalthough you only gave verbal support, it still encouraged him. His public expression of gratitude also enhanced your reputation and boosted the sales of your products.

Name: New Legend
Text: Good. The fact that you are here means you have mastered the fundamentals of business management. Now, it's time to set sail for new seas. May you become the new Legend of Akdilek!
